openPositions.title: Senior Frontend Developer
openPositions.summary: Join our frontend team to build cutting-edge web applications using React, Next.js, and modern web technologies. Lead technical decisions and mentor junior developers.
openPositions.description: We're looking for a Senior Frontend Developer to join our growing team and help build the next generation of web applications for our diverse client base. You'll work on challenging projects across various industries including healthcare, fintech, and e-commerce.
responsibilities: Architect and develop scalable frontend applications using React, Next.js, and TypeScript
Lead technical design discussions and make architectural decisions
Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
Collaborate with designers to implement pixel-perfect, responsive designs
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Write comprehensive unit and integration tests
Stay up-to-date with latest frontend technologies and best practices
Participate in agile development processes and sprint planning
Debug and resolve complex technical issues
Contribute to our internal design system and component library

essential: 5+ years of professional frontend development experience
Expert-level knowledge of React and its ecosystem
Strong proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML5, and CSS3
Experience with Next.js, Redux, or similar state management
Familiarity with modern build tools (Webpack, Vite, etc.)
Understanding of RESTful APIs and GraphQL
Knowledge of responsive design and cross-browser compatibility
Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)
preferred: Experience with Node.js and backend development
Previous experience in an agency environment
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

benefits: Hybrid work model (3 days office, 2 days remote)

openPositions.title: Backend Engineer (Node.js)
openPositions.summary: Build robust, scalable backend systems using Node.js, Express, and cloud technologies. Work on APIs that power applications used by thousands of users.
openPositions.description: We're seeking a talented Backend Engineer to design and develop scalable server-side applications. You'll work on microservices architecture, APIs, and database systems that power our client applications.
responsibilities: Design and develop RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints
Build scalable microservices using Node.js and Express
Implement database schemas and optimize queries
Integrate third-party APIs and payment gateways
Ensure security best practices and data protection
Write comprehensive tests and documentation
Monitor application performance and troubleshoot issues
Collaborate with frontend developers and DevOps team
Participate in code reviews and technical discussions
Contribute to architecture decisions and system design

essential: Strong proficiency in Node.js and Express.js
Understanding of RESTful API design principles
preferred: Experience with Redis or similar caching
Knowledge of message queues (RabbitMQ, Apache Kafka)
Experience with monitoring tools (New Relic, DataDog)

benefits: Flexible working hours across time zones

openPositions.title: UI/UX Designer
openPositions.summary: Create beautiful, user-centered designs for web and mobile applications. Work with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional user experiences.
openPositions.description: We're looking for a creative UI/UX Designer to join our design team. You'll be responsible for creating intuitive, engaging user experiences across various digital platforms and industries.
responsibilities: Conduct user research and create user personas
Design wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups
Create and maintain design systems and style guides
Collaborate with developers to ensure design implementation
Conduct usability testing and iterate based on feedback
Design responsive interfaces for web and mobile
Present design concepts to clients and stakeholders
Stay current with design trends and best practices
Work closely with product managers and developers
Contribute to brand identity and visual design projects

essential: Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD
Experience with responsive and mobile design
Knowledge of design systems and component libraries
preferred: Experience in agency or consultancy environment
Knowledge of motion design and micro-interactions
Experience with A/B testing and analytics
Knowledge of branding and visual identity
Degree in Design, HCI, or related field

benefits: Design book and resource library access

openPositions.title: DevOps Engineer
openPositions.summary: Lead infrastructure automation, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud architecture. Ensure scalable, secure, and reliable deployment processes.
openPositions.description: We're seeking an experienced DevOps Engineer to drive our infrastructure and deployment strategies. You'll work on cloud architecture, automation, and ensuring our systems can scale efficiently.
responsibilities: Design and maintain cloud infrastructure (AWS/Azure)
Implement and optimize CI/CD pipelines
Automate deployment processes and infrastructure provisioning
Monitor system performance and implement alerting
Ensure security best practices across all environments
Manage containerization with Docker and Kubernetes
Implement Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
Collaborate with development teams on deployment strategies
Troubleshoot production issues and optimize performance
Lead disaster recovery and backup strategies

essential: Strong experience with AWS or Azure cloud platforms
Experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions)
Knowledge of Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Ansible)
Understanding of networking and security principles
Knowledge of database administration and backup strategies
preferred: Previous experience in financial or healthcare industries
Degree in Computer Science or Engineering

openPositions.title: Mobile Developer (React Native)
openPositions.summary: Build cross-platform mobile applications using React Native. Create engaging mobile experiences for iOS and Android platforms.
openPositions.description: Join our mobile development team to create innovative mobile applications using React Native. You'll work on diverse projects ranging from e-commerce to healthcare applications.
responsibilities: Develop cross-platform mobile applications using React Native
Implement responsive and intuitive user interfaces
Integrate with RESTful APIs and third-party services
Optimize application performance and user experience
Implement push notifications and analytics
Write unit tests and conduct code reviews
Debug and resolve cross-platform compatibility issues
Collaborate with designers and backend developers

essential: Strong proficiency in React Native framework
Experience with React and Redux/Context API
Understanding of App Store and Google Play guidelines

preferred: Experience with native iOS (Swift) or Android (Kotlin)

Collaborate with content creators and designers
Manage client relationships and communication

Strong knowledge of SEO and content marketing
